text: dutare, nivu yarige avara mehr annu pavatisiruviro a nim'ma patniyaru mattu allahanu yud'dha praptiyagi nimagoppisiruva dasiyaru, mattu nim'ma tandeya sahodarara putriyaru mattu nim'ma tandeya sahodariyara putriyaru, mattu nim'ma tayiya sahodarara putriyaru mattu nim'ma tayiya sahodariyara putriyaru, nim'ma jotege valase hodavaru, tam'mannu devadutarigende mudipagiduva harake hottavaru â€“ devadutaru avarannu vivahavaga bayasuvudadare â€“ avarannu navu nim'ma palige sam'matagolisiruvevu. Idu itara visvasigalige anvayavagada, nimage matra iruva niyama. Avara patniyaru hagu dasiyara visayadalli navu avarige vidhisiruva niyamagala kuritu navu ballevu. Nim'ma palina ade tadegala nivaranegagi (idannu tilisalagide). Allahanu ksamisuvavanu hagu karunaluvagiddane
